fullProductInfo: Micromax Canvas A1::Micromax Canvas A1 is the company’s first smartphone based on the Android One program. This reasonably priced device makes the most of the latest Android OS and will be upgraded to the later versions as soon as the platforms are released. A 4.5-inch vibrant touchscreen brings your images and videos to life, while powerful internal system drives its performance.

Brings the Goodness of Android KitKat::One of the key features of this smartphone is that it makes the most of the advanced Android KitKat 4.4.4 mobile platform. As it is manufactured under the Android One program by Google, you can expect it to get instant updates as soon as they are released. What’s more, unlike other Android devices, you do not have to upgrade it manually. It installs the new version of the OS automatically. Operating this Android One smartphone will be buttery smooth with the intuitive interface offered by the KitKat platform. It lets you make smooth transitions between applications and place widgets on the home screen to get instant access to your favourite apps and games.

State-of-the-Art Architecture::Multitasking ranks high on the feature list of this Micromax KitKat phone. It is powered by a quad core MediaTek MT6582 processor sprinting at a speed of 1.3GHz. The chipset can support multiple applications at the same time and makes the device compatible with demanding games. It is accompanied by 1GB RAM, which ensures smooth navigation between applications and avoids performance lags.

Renders Vibrant Visuals::Lose yourself to the high resolution stunning visuals rendered on the scintillating display that graces the front panel of the Micromax Canvas A1. The FWVGA display measures 4.5 inches diagonally and delivers images at a resolution of 480 x 854 pixels. The display looks equally impressive from any angle, thanks to the IPS technology offering a wide viewing angle. Plus, you will not have to strain your eyes while viewing pictures in bright sunlight. What’s more, it has a colour depth of 16M and ensures colour precision for all your visuals. It also supports gesture recognition, allowing you to instantly open applications, zoom into web pages, pictures and more with simple gestures.

Freeze Your Special Moments::Casual photographers will appreciate the dual cameras provided with the Micromax AQ4501. They are great for capturing memorable moments in a snap. The rear panel of the smartphone plays host to a 5MP snapper featuring a resolution of 2560 x 1920 pixels. Special features like digital zoom, auto focus and LED flash are provided with the camera to help you capture good-quality images even in low-light conditions. It can also record full HD videos in 1080p resolution and play high definition videos without lags. As for the front-mounted snapper, this 2MP fixed focus 1600 x 1200 pixel camera can be used for making video calls to your loved ones over the Internet. You can even take stunning selfies using the front facing camera.

Supports Google Mobile Services::This Micromax Android One smartphone tags along a number of Google Mobile services such as Hangout, YouTube, Gmail, Google Search, Google Translate, Google Now, Maps, Photos and many more. They allow you to stay connected to your loved ones at all times, navigate through unknown places, send important emails and carry out a number of other tasks on the move. Additionally, you can even download a number of other applications from the Play store.

Multiple Connectivity Options::When it comes to connectivity and communication with different devices, the Micromax 4.5 inch phone offers plenty of options for both. It features Bluetooth for transferring and receiving data from other compatible gadgets. GPS helps you navigate easily to various places, while Wi-Fi connects to available hotpsots for Internet access. The device is also compatible with 3G networks. For wired connectivity, the device brings a micro USB port and a 3.5mm audio jack, allowing you to connect it to computer systems, laptops, audio accessories and more. This Micromax device is also compatible with audio and video formats like MP4, 3GPP, 3GP, MP3, WAV, AAC and more.

Ample Storage Capacity::You can save all your digital content on the phone and carry it along with you, wherever you go. Its total internal storage capacity amounts to 4GB, and if you need more space for those extra apps and games, you can easily expand the memory up to 32GB using a compatible microSD card.

Long Battery Life::The Micromax quad core mobile can stay operational for a long time, thanks to a 1700mAh that’s incorporated within the phone. It can deliver talk time of close to 6 hours and standby time of about 160 hours on a single charge. So, you can listen to the FM radio, chat or play games for hours without exhausting the battery.

Dual SIM Support::Keeping your personal and professional lives separate will be an easy task with this Micromax Canvas smartphone. It features dual SIM card slots that can be accessed by removing the back panel and the battery of the phone. Both the SIM cards remain active at all times so that you never miss an important call. These slots support the micro versions of the SIM cards.

fullProductInfo: Goodbye Blurred Images::Making a powerful entry in the Nexus series, the Google Nexus 5 by LG packs a punch with its sleek design and its touch-sensitive user interface. One of the key highlights of this smartphone is that like its predecessors, it uses stock Android, the original version of the platform that’s devoid of all customisations.

Produces Professional-Quality Images::The powerful new lens of the Google Nexus 5 lets you freeze brighter pictures even in low-light conditions. Its optical image stabilization feature cuts down on the blurring effect to a large extent. It captures steady shots by eliminating camera shakes that are most common occurrences for hand-held devices, resulting in clear and sharp images and videos.

Print on the Move::The LG Nexus 5 also comes with an HDR+ mode that lets you shoot several images in a go so that you get the best shot with a wider dynamic range. It provides bright daytime and dramatic night-time images. You can capture brilliant daytime pictures with just the right brightness and the background distinctly visible, while the night-time pictures will appear sharp with reduced background noise. The built-in software in the camera blends the images such that you get photos that are vivid and crystal clear.

Tell Your Story with Auto Awesome::Great for those who like to be productive on the move, this smart device lets you wirelessly communicate to printers for printing documents, sending email attachments or  choosing from the other print options. All you need is a printer compatible with Google Cloud Print and you will be good to go.

An Eye-Catching Display::The Auto Awesome feature enables you to make a movie by mixing your high-quality videos and photographs. To give you the feel of watching a streaming video, this LG smartphone lets you add your favourite background music clip too. So archive the prime moments in your life and tell your story in a better way with this thoughtful feature.

Power in Your Hands::With a wide 5-inch multi-touch area, you get more space to accomplish your tasks. The full HD display has a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels and pixel density of 445ppi and lets you view movies, videos and photos with picture-perfect clarity. It reduces glare and provides a broader viewing angle resulting in images that are vibrant and colourful.

Impressive Design::Multitask on the LG Google Nexus 5 with ease as a quad core Qualcomm Snapdragon 800 processor rests under the hood along with a 2GB RAM. In addition to letting you launch multiple applications at the same time, these components also offer smooth navigation when switching from one application to another. Its immensely powerful 2300mAh battery gives you a continuous talk time of about 17 hours and a standby time of almost 13 days or 300 hours on a single charge. One of the USPs of the Nexus 5 black is that the smartphone comes with a built-in wireless charging back plate for on-the-go charging too.

Accurately Executes Voice Commands::The Google Nexus 5 D821 has been made from materials that not only make the phone very robust, but exceptionally handy as well. With a thickness of just 8.59mm and weight of 130g, you can easily slip in the smartphone in your shirt pocket and carry it just about anywhere. This device makes a style statement wherever you go. You get to choose between shades like black and white for this phone.

Guides You on the Way::One of the most important aspects of the Nexus 5 by LG is its voice recognition feature. Just say ‘OK Google’ and the phone will instantly activate speech recognition and get ready to execute your commands. You can ask the device to send text messages, play music, get directions and do a lot of other things without touching the screen.

Keeps You Socially Active at All Times::With this Google device as your companion, you will never lose your way in an unknown location. Google Maps are pre-loaded on the KitKat-based device to give you accurate information about the different routes you can take to reach your destination. So get help with turn-by-turn navigation, look for public transit options or simply find an alternate route to avoid traffic jams in a matter of seconds.

fullProductInfo: Stay Smart, Keep Life Simple!::That's what Samsung promises with its new launch, the new Samsung Gear S Smartwatch (Black). Over the years, Samsung has been one of the leading companies inventing new designs and models, leaving customers spoilt for choice. The new Samsung Gear S Smartwatch (Black) is the ultimate dream of any gadget freak and will grasp the attention of even the not so technologically inclined. Take a look at what this newcomer promises.

Welcome to Smart Wearable Technology ::Now, literally wear technology on your wrist, as you use you're the Smartwatch as a one stop digital wallet to manage your tickets, coupons, boarding passes and more. Also you can receive real time push messages for location reminders when you are on the move. Being in a new place shouldn't really bother you as the built-in GPS helps you navigate with ease by using the Turn by Turn navigation and go to your desired destination with ease. The Gear S is enable to take voice commands, so enjoy the hands-free experience. Enjoy browsing through the Gear App Store as it provides a rich ecosystem of exclusive third party content.

Wearable Communicator: Be Connected At All Times ::A combination of a phone and a watch, the Samsung Gear S Smartwatch is a wonderful wearable communicator with widgets that are designed to make your life easy. Whether or not you carry a phone, you can be sure to remain connected at all times when you wear the Samsung Gear S. Available with 3G connectivity, you can make or receive calls, send and receive texts and connect to the internet on the go at superfast 3G speed. You can also use the inbuilt Wi-Fi feature. This smartwatch can be paired with any smartphone via Bluetooth.

Message On The Move ::Messaging could not have got easier, with the benefit of checking and replying to messages through the on-screen keyboard or the voice recognition system. It supports up to 70 languages, appealing to the majority of the masses. Helping in easy navigation, the smartwatch is equipped with an inbuilt GPS, and with the use of turn by turn navigation, you can be sure of never having a problem finding your way around. Another very important and appealing function is its ability to follow voice commands, making driving or riding safer and easier.

Multitude of Other Widgets:: The Samsung Gear S Smartwatch has many smart widgets like the News Briefing, Contacts, Weather, Music Player, S Health and more that are designed to make your life easier. Apart from these widgets, the basic smart watch is equipped with a 300mAh Li-ion battery that lasts for two full days. Its memory consists of a RAM of 512 MB with a storage capacity of 4 GB, providing you sufficient space for storing data. Its special features also include functions such as Health and Fitness calculators, Nike+ Running timer and it is IP67 Certified dust and water resistant feature protects it from their harmful effects. The Samsung Gear S also comes with a power saving mode, ensuring longer usage. Now you can always count on your smartwatch to help you in emergencies and never let you down

Smart Design With Smart Notification ::The Samsung Black smartwatch comes with a smart and impressive design, featuring a 2 inch (5.08 centimetres) curved super AMOLED capacitive touch screen with a resolution of 360x480 pixels. This ensures a perfect fit with a rich and comfortable view. The interface has been organized for convenience, with easily accessible notifications, apps and widgets at the swipe of a button on the Home Screen. The Smart notification alerts you on the arrival of a new message that is easy enough to check at a glance. Added to the attraction is the interchangeable strap design which enables you to easily revamp your look according to your wardrobe. Durability and style comes with its premium platinum plating, helping your device last longer.

Stunning display: Choose a clock face you like! ::The display is available with a number of new clock face choices which enable you to change them according to your outfit for the day, with just a single tap of the button. Choose from the various luxury dials and unique expressive pop faces making you look different every day. The Samsung Gear S Smart Watch (Black), with all its appealing characteristics and ultra-smart look, is a must buy for all those who are looking for a new and innovative gadget. So, shop online to purchase this brand new Samsung Gear S Smartwatch

Your Personal Fitness Monitor::The attractive widgets present on the screen of the device provide you easy access to your much needed folders throughout the day. The USP though is that the Smartwatch comes with a personal fitness monitor, automatically tracking your timings, be it a run or a walk. While the enhanced pedometer tracks your sitting time and reminds when it's time to go for a walk, it also tells you when you have reached a healthy walking pace. With detailed reports of your workouts all stored, you can track your fitness goals with feedback from this Smartwatch. If you are an outdoor person, then the smart sensors like the barometer, GPS, HR Monitor and UV sensor work in tandem to make your workout totally glitch free. So monitor your fitness regime from your wrist!

fullProductInfo: Easy to Use Keyboard::BlackBerry has changed the way business users look at cell phones. The Blackberry Q5 mobile is the third device in its range which features the revamped BlackBerry 10 OS. It features the classic curvy design with a full physical keyboard that features separated keys for ease of typing. Additionally, there are a number of features which makes life easier for BlackBerry users. The new Instant Action feature in the Blackberry Q5 lets you connect using BBM, reply to your emails and even quickly update your Facebook status.

Feature Packed Design::The Q5 is a Blackberry Dual Core mobile that is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon S4 processor. If you are looking for a budget priced Blackberry, then check this Dual Core mobile phone today.

fullProductInfo: Stay Entertained with Club Samsung::Featuring a mosaic-like pattern on the bezel, the Samsung Galaxy Grand 2 smartphone is similar to the Galaxy S3 in terms of looks. It is especially designed for people who prefer large screen devices over the compact ones. Thanks to its generous multi-touch area, you can enjoy movies, videos and your favourite TV shows on the move.

Stylishly Designed Stitched Back::The Galaxy Grand 2 boasts of Club Samsung, a personal entertainment channel for music, movies, videos, live TV and performances, games and much more. For a customised user experience, it lets you choose from nine different Indian languages, so you can enjoy content in the language you are most comfortable with. These languages include Marathi, Hindi, Gujarati, Punjabi, Tamil, Bengali, Telugu, Kannada and Malayalam. With the Discovery feature, you can narrow your search for content on the basis of language, genre, mood and era. Club Samsung also considers your browsing history to offer you a personalised experience.

Huge Display for Enhanced Visuals::The Samsung Galaxy Grand 2 smartphone shows off a stylishly designed rear panel, scoring brownie points for its premium look and feel. It adheres to the modern design approach of Samsung for its Galaxy range of products and will impress you with its textured and soft back cover featuring leather-like stitching. Apart from adding a stylish edge to the smartphone, it makes sure you get a firm grip over the device to facilitate one-handed use. This phone is  available in three eye-pleasing shades of black, white and pink.

Redefines Multitasking::The Samsung Galaxy mobile phone features a 5.2-inch TFT HD display with a resolution of 1280 x 720 pixels to render sharp visuals. Thanks to the 16:9 aspect ratio, the colour reproduction of this device is exceptional and feels natural to the eye. You can expect the device to deliver sharp images and even reproduce clear pictures in bright sunlight. In spite of the big screen, the device is extremely portable and easily fits in your pocket.

Captures Stunning High Resolution Images::The Multi Window divides the screen into two frames, allowing you to work on multiple tasks on a single screen. So you can now check your emails while watching a video or surfing the Internet. This feature is quite useful if you like to be in control of multiple tasks to save time. You will even find a number of other proprietary applications such as Samsung Hub, ChatOn, Samsung App, Group Play, S Translator, Story Album and many more.

Powerful Processing and Diverse Connectivity Options::The high response 8MP auto focus camera at the rear of the Samsung Galaxy Grand 2 mobile is capable of taking excellent pictures and videos at a high resolution. Thanks to LED flash, you can easily capture pictures in low-light conditions. It is also capable of full HD recording. For enhanced photo capturing, the camera features various advanced picture modes like Sound & Shot, which captures the words that were spoken while taking the picture. For video calling, this phone also has a 1.9MP camera located right next to its touchscreen. Group Play feature lets you share your pictures, videos and other digital content with your friends.

Stay Connected to Your Social Life::A device as advanced as this requires a powerful processor for smooth functioning. So Samsung has incorporated a quad core processor capable of running at a speed of 1.2GHz to take care of the device’s multitasking capabilities. Besides supporting multiple applications at the same time, the chipset accelerates the process of loading web pages and even plays online HD videos smoothly. The long lasting 2,600mAh battery of the Samsung Galaxy Android mobile offers up to 17 hours of uninterrupted talk time and close to 370 hours of standby time. Its connectivity options include 2G (EDGE/GPRS [850/900/1,800/1,900MHz]), 3G (HSPA+ 21Mbps [850/900/1,900/2,100MHz]), Wi-Fi a/b/g/n/ and Bluetooth v4.0 with DI, MAP, PBAP, A2DP, AVRCP, HFP, HSP, OPP, HID and PAN. It supports USB V2.0 and you can use its mobile hotspot feature to allow other devices to connect to the Internet.

The one on the rear panel has an 8MP lens and allows you to record full HD videos, while the front-facing 2MP snapper is apt for taking good-quality selfies and making video conferencing calls over the web.

fullProductInfo: Powerful Hardware Combination::The Samsung Galaxy S5 is a major upgrade from the Samsung S4. It is a feature rich smartphone packed with the latest hardware. With a superb and sleek design powered by the Quad 1.9GHz octa-core processor and built-in 16GB internal memory, the Samsung Galaxy S5 phone is fast. It's memory can also be expanded up to 64GB, providing optimum storage space for your movies, music and heavy files. You can carry your entertainment wherever you go. At the same time, keeping in mind user functionality, this phone is dustproof and water resistant.

Latest Android Technology with a Beautiful Display::The Samsung Android mobile phone runs on the Android KitKat 4.4.2 OS that makes its interface easy and smooth to work on. The 5.1-inch full HD Super AMOLED display supports multi touch and brings images and videos to life with its dense color grading. This also enhances the gaming experience in this smartphone and even the tiniest detail can be seen with superb clarity. To further enhance security, you can use your fingerprint to quickly unlock the Samsung Quad Core mobile phone without entering a password.

Long Battery Life with Powerful Camera::Smartphones are often plagued by poor battery life problems. However, this Samsung Galaxy S5 shimmery white comes with a 2800mAH battery with Ultra Power Saving Mode to give you the extra hours you desire when the battery is low. It has a 16MP rear camera and a 2MP front camera that has auto focus, selective focus and includes HDR to provide you with crisp imaging. If you are a fitness freak, it has a heart rate sensor which lets you monitor your heart rate merely with the touch of a finger.

For brighter and vivid captures::For both photos and videos, turn on the HDR when there is a strong counter-light or when the subject is shaded. Preview in real time natural light and color being reproduced vividly and clearly while you take your shot.
Don't miss the action::Don't hesitate to shoot and capture action as it's happening! The faster Auto Focus helps you capture important moments of movement more quickly and in focus.
Treasure moments in detailed focus::Selective Focus allows you to focus on what’s important by blurring the background and accentuating the main subject in defined detail.

Enhancing power for important situations::Use the Ultra Power Saving Mode to save and extend your battery life so you no longer have to worry about missing important calls when your phone is running low on battery. This innovative feature changes your screen to black and white and shuts down all unnecessary features to dramatically minimize battery consumption.
Made to last longer and stronger::With an IP67 certification, Galaxy S5 is resistant to sweat, rain, liquids, sand and dust, so your phone is protected for any activity and situation.
Following your every beat::Galaxy S5 is the first smart phone with a built-in Heart Rate Sensor which enables you to measure your heart rate directly on your phone.

Your personal fitness tracker::The enhanced S Health leads you through your fitness routines daily and consistently. Set your goals and achieve them with the help of Galaxy S5's pedometer and S Health’s constant tracking of your condition, walking distance, calories, speed, duration, and so on.

Powered speed with Wi-Fi together::The Download Booster technology lets you use the Wi-Fi simultaneously to give you an unrivaled network experience! When you need to download files in a hurry, turn on the Wi-Fi together and experience approximately 80~90% of the added network speed of Wi-Fi.

Doubled connection, Faster speed::The 5th generation Wi-Fi 802.11ac and 2X2 MIMO technology equip Galaxy S5 with two internal Wi-Fi antennas to double the connection and accelerate the speed of your Wi-Fi like never before.

Fingerprint security and access::Security has been upgraded and personalized. You can now unlock your phone and make faster and more secure payments via PayPal with the swipe of your finger. When purchasing content with Samsung services, you can use your fingerprint instead of entering your Samsung account password.

A stunning view with rich vitality::Galaxy S5 offers the most excellent viewing experience a smartphone can offer. Its FHD Super AMOLED display is brighter with more clarity, delivering a deeper and more vivid screen view. Galaxy S5’s advanced Local Contrast Enhancement enables it to adapt and change according to the variation in light conditions. Under the sun or too much light, Galaxy S5 gives you an optimized display for you to see clearly and easily. On the other hand, when there is a lack of light, Galaxy S5 allows you to dim your display light so that your eyes feel more comfortable in the dark.

For a more personalized viewing experience::Galaxy S5 is equipped with Samsung’s advanced display technology enhancing your viewing experience beyond expectations. The Adapt Display analyses incoming lights and the contents you're viewing and automatically optimizes the colour range, saturation, and sharpness of your display. Experience your Gallery, Camera, Internet, Video, and Smart Remote applications with a display adapted to you.

fullProductInfo: Sturdy Chassis with Stylish Looks::The Samsung Galaxy S5 is one of the most popular choices among young professionals when it comes to high-end feature-rich smartphones. It features an elegant look carved in a curvy body. With a thickness of just 8.1mm, this phone comfortably slips in your pocket or handbag. The sturdy design gives the phone the strength to withstand abrasions, keeping it as good as new for longer. The Samsung S5 5.1-inch, full HD touchscreen is dust and water resistant so it remains safe from water, sand and sweat marks.

Capture and Store All Your Memories::The Samsung Galaxy S5 features a 16MP camera that lets you capture all that catches your fancy. Fast auto focus captures every tiny detail for that perfect shot. To make your photographs look more real, Samsung offers selective focus that lets you focus on your target by blurring the background. You can store all your captured memories on its 16GB ROM, which is further expandable up to 128GB. The Samsung Galaxy S5 mobile comes with pre-installed applications. This phone runs on the latest version of Android KitKat v4.2.2, powered by a 1.9GHz processor.

User-Friendly Features::The Galaxy S5 Android phone offers great user-friendly features, making your everyday tasks easy. You can now keep a track of your health with its built-in heart sensor. It lets you keep a track of your heart beats with a simple touch on the back of the phone, and the personal fitness tracker helps you set fitness goals and achieve them. A powerful battery backup ensures that you can use all these applications without worrying about a low battery. The Samsung S5 mobile phone comes with ultra power saving mode that switces off background apps when not in use.

fullProductInfo: Unique and Attractive Design::The Samsung Galaxy Note 3 SM-N9000 is one of the most efficient Android gadgets designed for people who are always on the move. This extremely stylish gadget makes it quite easy for you to carry out a number of tasks and also doubles up as your digital planner. You can say goodbye to your paper planner and still continue writing your important notes using the S Pen stylus which comes with the device.

Easy Access to S Pen Apps::The first thing you are likely to notice about the Samsung Galaxy Note 3 is its good looks. In spite of packing a punch in the form of powerful components, the device maintains a sleek profile. While its front panel is completely covered by a high resolution touchscreen, a soft leather-like cover with top stitching encases the rear panel of the smartphone. This panel gives you a firm grip over the device, so that it doesn’t slip. It even ensures convenient one-handed use, despite the huge size. The phone is also protected from unwanted scratches and fingerprints with a protective casing. This Samsung phone is available in shades like jet black, classic white and blush pink.

Keep Your Phone Organised:: One of the most important aspects of this smartphone from the Note series is its S Pen that makes it quite easy for you to carry out various operations. Removal of the S pen of the Samsung Galaxy Note 3 signals the display of the Air Command menu featuring five S Pen features. You can even launch the S Pen-specific applications by simply hovering the stylus over the screen and clicking the button embedded on the stylus. The five options include Action Memo, Scrapbook, Screen Write, S Finder, and Pen Window.

Advanced Search Option::Keeping your phone organised has become way easier with the Scrapbook function of this Samsung Android mobile phone. All you need to do to categorise all your images, videos and more is tap on the Scrapbooker button that pops up in the Air Command menu. Now, simply circle the images and other content that you wish to save and move to Scrapbook and the device will do the rest.

Take and Edit Notes::The Samsung Galaxy Android mobile phone makes sure you do not have to spend time on looking for something you don’t remember where you saved. Its S Finder function in the Air Command section lets you launch a search in the phone by keyword or on the basis of other parameters like date, location or content filters. It can even look for relevant content on the web.

Easily Crop Images::The new S Note on the Samsung Galaxy Android mobile enables you to quickly jot down notes and conveniently go through them and edit them whenever required. One of its main benefits is that you can synchronize it with Evernote, one of the most popular productive applications in the Play store.

Recognises Your Handwriting::Cropping images is now an extremely easy task. You can use the stylus to conveniently crop images. Just select the section to be cropped, and the Easy Clip function does the rest, instantly and professionally.

Enhanced Multi Window:: A smart and user-friendly phone in the true sense, the Samsung Galaxy Note 3 mobile has the ability to recognise your handwriting and convert it into text. So if you are not in the mood of typing or simply wish to scribble something on the phone in your natural handwriting, you can do so on this smartphone.

Grand Display with Amazing Clarity::An all new version of the Multi Window app is deployed in the Samsung smartphone. In addition to opening two application windows, you now get the option of dragging and dropping text and images from one window to another. What’s more, you can even open a single app in two different windows. Also, it creates a new small window on top of an existing window for added convenience.

Get Your Own Magazine::The Note 3 features an excellent 5.7-inch super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen. Images and colours get a new dimension on this 1920 x 1080 pixel resolution screen. Enjoy superb clarity and sharpness on this display. There are five different colour settings - Adapt Display, Dynamic, Standard, Professional Photo and Movie - so you can adjust the screen colour as per your convenience and preference.

fullProductInfo: Impressive Photography Tool::The Samsung Galaxy S5 provides a unique photographic experience as it features a stunning 16MP primary camera. It's one of the first models to feature an autofocus speed as high as 0.3 seconds! Use the Selective Focus camera feature of this Samsung Galaxy S5 mobile phone to make the primary object more prominent and blur the background, so that you can take crisp and focused photos. With the HDR, you can click or shoot your subject even if there's a visible counterlight or uneven shading or indoor light.

Rich and Clear Display::Packed with a 5.1-inch FHD Super AMOLED touchscreen, this Samsung Galaxy S5 charcoal black smartphone provides you a superior and rich viewing experience. On its 1920 x 1080 pixel resolution, all your high definition movies and photos look picturesque and eye catching. With Local Contrast Enhancement, this smartphone changes and adapts to the light conditions. Whether you are in low light conditions or facing too much sunlight, you can dim or brighten up the display of this Samsung Android phone to let you clearly see your files, videos or pictures.

Health Monitor with Enhanced Security::The Samsung Quad Core phone is the first model to incorporate the heart rate sensor. It allows you to put your finger on the back of the phone to measure and check your heart rate. With S Health and pedometer, you can keep track of various parameters when you go for a walk. It monitors the distance covered, time taken and your speed in addition to other factors. For enhanced security, this Samsung Galaxy S5 comes with a fingerprint scanner that stores your fingerprint as your password so that only you can unlock your phone.

Impressive Design::The Samsung Galaxy S5 is an advanced successor of the Galaxy 4 versions.. It adopts a completely unique design that makes heads turn wherever you take it. Although this phone employs a 5.1-inch touchscreen, it is designed to perfectly fit in your palm and even facilitates one-handed use. What’s more, a set of powerful features are also deployed in it for a fast and improved performance.

Great for Casual Photographers::A mesmerizing design greets you as soon as you lay your eyes on this stunning smartphone. The front panel of the phone is completely dominated by a touchscreen, while its back panel is protected by a cover with a perforated pattern that renders it a modern look. Like its predecessors, the Samsung Galaxy S5 mobile phone has contoured edges, which give you a firm grip over the device. Based on your colour preferences, you can get this device in shades like charcoal black, shimmery white, electric blue and copper gold.

Captures Moving Objects::The Samsung Galaxy S5 provides a unique photographic experience as it features a stunning 16MP primary camera. A 2MP webcam is fitted on the front side for allowing you to capture selfies and make video calls. It comes with an enhanced menu and user interface, which make it quite easy to capture, save and edit your images.

Takes Vivid and Clear Shots::In addition to capturing regular pictures, it boasts of fast auto focus to let you capture fast-moving objects with ease. It comes in handy when you need to take a picture of a moving car or a sports event. It does away with the blurry effect and gives you a clear picture.

Adjustable Focus::Thanks to the HDR mode, you can expect the Samsung Android phone to take clear and vivid shots every time. While clicking pictures or recording videos, you can switch the HDR mode on to tackle counterlight or capture shaded subjects with ease.

Features Heart Rate Monitor::Selective Focus is a feature that allows you to bring your main object in focus. You can blur the background in the image to make your subject stand out. It comes in quite handy to create the shallow depth of field effect, without resorting to external lenses.

Serves as Your Health Monitor::The Samsung quad core phone is the first model to incorporate the heart rate sensor. It allows you to put your finger on the back of the phone to measure and check your heart rate. It helps you check it any time of the day to monitor the current status.

Fingerprint Scanner for Added Security::With S Health and pedometer, you can keep track of various parameters when you go for a walk. It monitors the distance covered, time taken and your speed in addition to other factors. Thanks to these features, the device acts as your personal trainer as well as a health monitor. You can even connect the device to fitness bands like the Samsung Gear Fit and the Gear 2 for added convenience.

Rugged Waterproof Exterior::A fingerprint scanner deployed in the phone prevents data theft by allowing only authorised access to the content saved on your device. In addition to allowing you to unlock your device, it also acts as your password for making purchases through the Samsung store.

Provides Extended Battery Life::This Samsung Galaxy Android mobile is known for its rugged build and sturdiness. It can easily withstand spills and splashes as well as dust and sand, and is even IP67 certified. So, you can take it with you on adventure trips, without worrying about damaging your device.

The iPhone 5S mobile phone has a 4-inch multi-touch UI with IPS retina display with a resolution of 1130 x 640 pixels that renders high-quality photos, videos and movies. The iPhone Space grey is the first iPhone to have more LTE bands enabling ultra fast LTE wireless coverage.

Equipped with iOS7 Platform, Custom Lock::The brand new iOS 7 platform of the iPhone 5S 16 GB lets you explore more than 900,000 entertaining and engaging apps. The operating system features Touch-ID with capacitive touch-sensor that recognizes your fingerprints and unlocks the phone only when it matches your stored fingerprints. All purchases from the App Store and iTunes can be made through a valid fingerprint match. This iPhone is equipped with a new iSight camera of 8MP that comes with a larger sensor, wider aperture, True Tone flash, Burst mode and slow-motion video support enabling you to take photogenic shots.

Enriching Browsing and Sharing Experience::When it comes to surfing on the net and sharing multimedia files, then iPhone 5s with Retina display stands out. It features a host of connectivity options including UMTS, DC-HSDPA, HSPA+, 3G, EDGE, GSM and Wi-Fi allowing you to send emails, download applications and documents, and transfer content at lightning speeds. It supports 2G, 3G, and 4G networks so that you stay connected to your social life wherever you are. The Li-Ion battery gives a robust backup with up to 10 hours talk time and up to 250 hours standby time.

fullProductInfo: Engineered for Superior Performance::The Apple iPhone 4S runs on a powerful A5 chip that delivers high performance. Thanks to the 512MB RAM of this smartphone, you can run several applications at the same time without impacting the response time. This smartphone is loaded with an internal storage capacity of 8GB that lets you store virtually all your media files. Be it your favourite movies, vacation snapshots or best-loved songs, you can conveniently store them on the iPhone 4S. Its iOS 7 operating system offers an array of applications to enhance your touchscreen experience.

Camera for Casual Clicks, Improved Connectivity::Indulge your passion for photography with the iPhone 4S 8GB mobile phone as it comes equipped with a high resolution 8MP iSight camera. This camera has several impressive features such as Autofocus, Tap to Focus, Face Detection, Panorama and Photo Geotagging. You can also record your memorable moments by shooting HD videos at a resolution of 1080 pixels. The FaceTime HD front camera lets you stay connected with your friends, family and business associates through video calls. This smartphone comes with several connectivity options such as EDGE, 2G, 3G, Wi-Fi 802.11b/g/n, USB and Bluetooth v4.0.

Stylish Design, Retina Display and Long Lasting Battery::Designed with a stylish exterior, the Apple iPhone 4S white will let you make a remarkable statement wherever you carry it. The 3.5-inch widescreen Retina display has a resolution of 960 x 640 pixels that gives you an immersive and engaging viewing experience. Anti-smudge oleophobic coating resists fingerprints and keeps the Apple iPhone 4S screen clean for you. Powered by a rechargeable lithium-ion battery, this phone keeps going for long hours on a single charge. It offers up to 14 hours talk time on 2G and up to 8 hours on 3G.

Backed by a powerful battery and these features, the LG Nexus 5 is a phone you can depend upon.

Moreover, this LG dual SIM phone uses the Android v4.4 KitKat operating system. Not only is this operating system exceedingly user friendly, it also gradually adapts itself to your needs, allowing you to quickly browse the web, race through games and easily switch between apps.

fullProductInfo: Micromax Canvas Knight A350::The Micromax Canvas Knight A350 is a stylish smartphone that packs a wallop, without depleting all your resources. It combines an Android KitKat 4.4.2 operating system with a Tru Octa-Core processor to give you improved speed and functionality. Its full HD display delivers high-quality visuals, including videos and pictures which you can capture yourself, using the 16MP rear camera or the 8MP front camera. With a slim profile and a damage-resistant glass screen, this phone is both good-looking and sturdily built. You can choose from the full black or black/gold and white/gold colour options.

User-Friendly Interface with the KitKat OS::This smartphone uses its Android KitKat 4.4.2 OS to your advantage. Its intuitive functionality prioritizes the numbers you call the most, giving you quick and easy access. With integrated Google Docs and Google Drive features, this Android mobile phone enables you to carry all your important work files and other documents wherever you go. To activate the voice search option while on the homepage, all you have to do is say “Okay Google”. The built-in Hangouts application stores all your voice, video and text messages in one place, so you never have to lose the thread in an important conversation.

Octa-Core Processor for High-speed Functionality::This dual SIM smartphone has eight core processors that run simultaneously, giving you the ability to multitask without any hassles. The Tru Octa-Core works in conjunction with the built-in 2GB RAM to make your device even more responsive. The appearance and functionality of the user interfaces of both, applications and the operating system, are further enhanced. You no longer have to wait long, arduous minutes for more than one application or browser to load. The Micromax Octa Core phone allocates a different core to each, ensuring seamless operation. Playing HD games is also smoother on account of its multi-threaded programming, which provides real-time characteristics. In video decoding mode, battery usage is reduced by almost 18 percent, whereas display mode increases the frame rate by 20 percent.

Record Your Favourite Moments for Posterity::With a 16MP rear camera and an 8MP front camera, you never have to lose another opportunity to take a great selfie or a gorgeous landscape shot. The rear camera, in combination with an upgraded M8 Largan lens and a CameraChip sensor, allows you to capture videos and images in 1080p. You can easily store these large HD files on the phone’s massive 32GB internal memory. The Electronic Image Stabilization software on this 16MP camera phone also allows you to partake in burst photography for crisp, sequential shots.

Corning Gorilla Glass Adds Elegance::Enjoy high-definition videos, games and images with life-like clarity and a stunning 1920 x 1080 pixel screen resolution, on the wide 5-inch screen. This phone with IPS display offers better viewing angles and more accurate colour detail, which is enhanced by the Corning Gorilla Glass. This thin glass covering is both visually stunning and astonishingly tough, enabling it to withstand the rigours of regular use. Apart from being scratch-resistant, it has a smooth, glossy surface that remains unaffected by minor bumps or collisions

Crystal Clear Audio::While the KitKat OS displays gorgeous fullscreen album covers as songs play in the lock mode, the phone’s Yamaha amplifier enhances the audio output. Not only does this help you listen to your favourite songs at a lower volume, which protects your hearing, but it also picks up every nuance of the musical composition. It gives you clear high notes and rich base notes, enabling you to watch movies or play games with greater sound quality on your mobile phone with 2GB RAM.

A Fashionable Phone::With the stylish, brushed metallic finish on its sleek body and its glossy glass screen, this phone is a real beauty. The best part about it is you can choose between the classy full black model, which will always be in vogue, and the rich black and gold or chic white and gold combination models. The gold used is a warm and lovely champagne colour, which makes the phone even more striking. With such an overwhelming mix of great features, the Micromax Canvas Knight A350 black mobile phone is definitely a keeper.
productSummary: 16MP primary camera with full HD video recording, flash, auto focus and 8MP front facing camera, Corning Gorrila glass
5-inch IPS capacitive touchscreen with 1920 x 1080 pixels resolution and 16.7M color support
Android v4.4.2 KitKat operating system with 1.7GHz octa core processor, 2GB RAM, 32GB internal memory and dual SIM (GSM+GSM)
2350mAH battery providing talk-time of 7 hours and standby time of 175 hours on 2G networks

fullProductInfo: Powerful Processor::The Apple iPhone 5S takes the cake for being one of the most advanced smartphones of recent times. It features an amazing camera that lets you capture some great pictures and incorporates high-quality and powerful components for a superlative performance. As for the design, it pleases anyone who’s looking for a sleek and stylish phone.

Motion Detecting Coprocessor::The Apple iPhone 5S is equipped with a powerful A7 processor that is based on the 64-bit architecture. The A7 chip has double the capacity of the A6 chip, which means you will be able to enjoy multimedia games with complete 3D effects. This device also delivers a faster CPU performance and enables you to multitask by launching more than a couple of applications at the same time.

High Resolution Touchscreen::The iPhone 5S has a motion detecting coprocessor, the M7 coprocessor, that senses motion-oriented data. So when you're consulting Maps while travelling or evaluating your performance on the treadmill with the aid of workout applications, the co-processor automatically starts functioning and takes the load off the main processor. It detects when you park the car and start walking towards your destination and automatically switches from driving to walking while you are navigating. What’s more, the coprocessor recognises if the device has not been picked up for a while and reduces network usage to save on battery.

Extremely Stylish::The Apple smartphone features a 4-inch Retina multi-touch screen that gives you an enhanced visual experience. It has a high screen resolution of 1136 x 640 pixels and colour depth of 16M. The contrast ratio of the display is 800:1 and it has an oleophobic coating to withstand fingerprints. These features bring your photos, movies and videos to life and displays them with utmost clarity.

Keep Memories Fresh with iSight::What makes this advanced smartphone from Apple distinct from other phones is its precision construction mark in a sleek glass and metal golden colour aluminium casing. A sapphire crystal is fitted on the home button as well as near the iSight camera for protecting it. The sleek and light device measures 7.6mm in thickness and is great for one-handed use. You can choose from stunning shades like gold, silver and space grey.

Advanced Security Features::The iPhone 5S comes with two superior cameras. The primary camera with a resolution of 8MP features the iSight technology that enables you to capture crystal clear snaps. Its burst mode feature lets you click 10 snapshots in one second and its sensor is relatively large to allow more light to pass through it. Both the white LED and amber LED deployed in the device, adjust the flash intensity and colour temperature of your picture for optimum results. You can capture panoramic shots and square pictures and even enhance your images with the help of multiple filters available in the phone. It is possible to zoom while recording a video and capture HD videos at the rate of 120 frames per second. Auto image stabilisation is another one of this iPhone’s benefits, which makes sure your images have less noise. This feature also does away with the blurring effect caused due to hand and camera shake.

FaceTime for Video Calling::This smartphone has an exclusive fingerprint identity sensor called Touch ID, that can recognize the impression of your fingers when they are placed on the home button. This smartphone by Apple will only unlock when you place your finger on the sensor. This technology ensures that nobody else is able to use the device. In case you want anyone else to have access to the phone, you can easily save their fingerprints on it as well. It is also possible to save your fingerprint as the password for iTunes and Apple App Store, making it safe for you to purchase applications and other digital content from the app store.

Intuitive and User-Friendly OS::Making FaceTime video calls from your phone to any other Apple iPhone is a breeze with the front-facing FaceTime camera. It lets you keep in touch with your friends and loved ones even if they are miles apart from you. The webcam of the iPhone 5S has larger pixels as well as a backside illumination sensor so that poor lighting conditions do not deter your web conferencing calls. It is possible to make audio-only FaceTime calls too.

fullProductInfo: Ingeniously Simple Design::Ingeniously simple. That's the Plantronics Discovery 975 Bluetooth earpiece. Blending easy connectivity with dual-microphone, noise-canceling AudioIQ2 technology and patented ear tips for a stable, comfortable fit, this elegantly simple earpiece lets you listen clearly and makes you sound sharp, even in noisy environments. With its innovative, rechargeable carrying case that can triple your talk time while you're on the go, you'll wonder why staying connected hasn't always been this simple.

Ingeniously Simple Connectivity: QuickPair and Multi-Point Technology::Minimal in size, maximum in performance, the Discovery 975 offers an elegant simplicity that conceals  its advanced sound technologies. For starters, an easy-to-access button offers one-touch control over powering the earpiece on and off and answering and ending calls. A subtle white indicator light flashes only once when the earpiece is powered on. The earpiece features a dedicated volume control that's also a handy mute control. Voice prompts keep you in the know when your Bluetooth connection is lost, the earpiece is on mute, or the battery is running low.

The Discovery 975 Bluetooth earpiece offers:::The Discovery 975 also features a patented gel ear tip that offers a supremely comfortable and secure fit. The flexible silicone tip makes it effortless to take the earpiece on and off while the unique shape of the tip provides a stable fit that doesn't interfere with glasses.

Ingeniously Advanced AudioIQ2 and WindSmart Technologies::You've already got enough to think about without having to worry about how to connect your earpiece to your cell phone. Thanks to QuickPair technology and universal connectivity, pairing the Discovery 975 with virtually any Bluetooth-enabled phone couldn't be any easier.

Ingenious On-the-Go Charging Triples Your Talk Time::Simply turn your phone's Bluetooth feature on, turn the earpiece on, and follow the commands on your phone. It's that simple. The Discovery 975 also features multipoint technology, so you can pair it with two Bluetooth devices such as your personal mobile phone and your work smartphone, keeping you connected wherever you are.

One touch conference call connection::The superior sound performance of the Discovery 975 begins with dual-mic AudioIQ2 technology. Dual microphones simultaneously capture your voice and cancel background noise so you can be heard clearly, while the earpiece's 20-band equalizer delivers rich, natural voice quality. Meanwhile, AudioIQ2 technology automatically adjusts incoming calls to clear, comfortable listening levels.

fullProductInfo: Uses Advanced Technology to Block Out Noise::The Plantronics M1100 headset is integrated with advanced Bluetooth technology, allowing you to have hands-free conversations while you need to multi-task. The AudioQ3 technology and advanced digital signal processing (DSP0) of the wireless Bluetooth headset blocks most outside noise, allowing clear conversations. Thanks to its voice command feature, you can answer calls, redial, cancel or call information without lifting a finger. The InstantMeeting feature identifies conference calls and reminds you just before a meeting is about to start. With one touch of the button, this Bluetooth headset connects you to your conference calls.

Produces High Fidelity Sound::The Plantronics M1100 Bluetooth headset is equipped with voice alerts that inform you when your battery is low or whether your phone is connected or not. It also integrates a software that indicates the headsets battery level on your iPhone. Thanks to its advanced A2DP profile, you can stream your favourite music and podcasts, no matter where you go. This Bluetooth device also has three microphones, which flawlessly capture your natural voice and deliver to the caller. You can control its volume with the special voice control button provided. This A2DP Bluetooth headset clips onto your ear effortlessly.

Three Microphones to Capture Your Natural Voice::Notable for its triple-mic design and intelligent voice recognition, the Plantronics Savor M1100 Bluetooth Headset takes wireless communications to a new level. With the Savor headset, you can use your voice to answer calls, check headset status, or dial Plantronics Vocalyst or Microsoft's Bing411 audio services. The headset also lets you stream music, podcasts, and more wirelessly from your mobile phone using A2DP Bluetooth technology. A lightweight build and flexible ear tips increase the headset's comfort.

Voice Commands for Hands-Free Operation::The Savor sports a unique V-frame design with three synchronized mics strategically placed to best capture your voice. The addition of a third, noise-activated microphone better isolates your voice for a more natural sound without the need for a long boom.

One-Year Free Subscription to Vocalyst::The AudioiQ3 technology with advanced Digital Signal Processing (DSP) further reduces background noise and enables clear conversations between you and your listener.

Voice and Visual Alerts::With voice-activation technology, you can answer calls without lifting a finger. Simply say "answer" to pick up an incoming call, or press the dedicated voice button for a host of other convenient commands, such as "pair mode," "redial," "cancel," or "call information."

Stream Music and More from Your Mobile Phone::Using this feature, you can access Plantronics Vocalyst hands-free text and audio email service, or Microsoft's Bing 411 service for traffic, weather, sports, news, and other updates.

Comfy Ear Tips and a Lightweight Construction::The Savor package includes a free, one-year subscription to Plantronics Vocalyst (service in USA only), which provides you with a variety of voice and text services that you can access directly from the headset. With Vocalyst, you can use simple voice commands to have your emails, text messages, or Twitter feed read aloud to you, and even send text replies while you're listening. And if you want to record a reminder for yourself, Vocalyst can send it to you as an audio email.
One touch conference call connection::NOTE: Vocalyst's email services are supported by Gmail, AOL, and Yahoo. The text feature works with Blackberry and Android smart phones.

fullProductInfo: Stunning, User-Friendly Display::The Lenovo A2G9i is a smartphone that runs on the smart and intuitive Android OS, which offers you a mind-blowing application interface and an enjoyable mobile gaming experience. Powered by a high speed 1GHz processor, this phone offers the ease of multitasking along with quick responsiveness. Plus, a decent 2MP camera with fixed focus adds to the advantages of owing this smartphone.

High Speed Processing::The Lenovo mobile A269i features a 3.5-inch HVGA capacitive display that renders crisp and clear images. With a screen resolution of 480 x 320 pixels, this phone makes the images appear realistic and plays videos in vibrant colours. At this resolution, the phone lets you enjoy HD quality visuals too, enhancing your overall viewing experience. The highly responsive capacitive screen offers easy navigation across screens with a simple swipe. This feature also enhances your web browsing and gaming experience. The capacitive screen includes buttons for accessing the previous page, navigating the menu and returning to the home screen. It features a mosaic-like pattern on its back cover that prevents fingerprint marks and keeps the panel clean for longer. The rear of the phone features a 2MP camera. At the top, you get a 3.5mm headphone jack that can be used to attach earphones when you are in the mood for some music or for enjoying endless hours of hands free conversations.

Fulfills All Your Entertainment and Business Needs::At the heart of its operations is a powerful dual core processor that lets makes multitasking so much easy for you. It also ensures that you can switch between or launch multiple applications at the same time without experiencing performance lags.. Dual core processing also lets you enjoy efficient flash-enabled web browsing, conference calls and video chats. With its superior processing power, the Lenovo A269i mobile phone provides more resources to the Android v2.3 Gingerbread operating system to run graphic-intensive tasks simultaneously. It also distributes work from one core to two separate cores, leading to significant improvement in overall performance and user experience.

Impressive Storage Space and Picture Quality::The Lenovo smartphone runs on the Android 2.3 operating system that facilitates easy navigation and lets you enjoy some of the best apps and games through Google Play store. One of the top listed Lenovo A269i specifications is its dual SIM card slots. Now you can carry two SIM cards in a single device and seamlessly manage your personal and professional contacts. This feature is especially useful when you are travelling and need to utilize a local SIM card for better connectivity. It also allows you to access the best tariffs wherever you are. Even if you are travelling out of town, you can easily manage your talk time charges with a local SIM rather than through the use of a roaming SIM card. Long battery life supports all your dual SIM tasks. Powered by a Li-Po 1300mAh replaceable battery, it lets you enjoy talk time of 19 hours and standby time of 21 days. Ever felt like using your phone’s data connection to browse Internet on your laptop? Use the Wi-Fi hotspot functionality of this Lenovo phone and effortlessly access Internet on any Wi-Fi enabled device. You can configure this smartphone as a Wi-Fi hotspot when you want to share the Internet connection with other nearby devices including tablets and laptops. It also lets you share files faster over a single network. You can use it in case you prefer to browse the Internet or check important emails on your laptop or tablet instead of your smartphone.

Renders Crystal Clear Visuals Every Time::The brilliant display that graces the front panel of this Micromax smartphone measures 4.7 inches and renders breathtaking images at a resolution of 1280 x 720 pixels.
